rooms.description: Entryway with a Vastu-aligned north facade to welcome positive energy. Features a small foyer area with direct access to the courtyard.
Spacious living area overlooking the central courtyard, positioned in the southeast corner for balance according to Vastu principles.
Adjacent to the kitchen and living room, designed with ample natural light from the courtyard.
Fully equipped modern kitchen facing south as per Vastu guidelines for auspicious energy flow.
Cozy guest bedroom with access to the courtyard and designed on the east side for positive circulation.
Spacious master bedroom located in the north-west section ensuring privacy and adhering to Vastu principles. Includes an en-suite bathroom.
Private bathroom attached to the master bedroom ensuring privacy and convenience.
Dedicated workspace adjacent to the living area for a balanced work-life environment.

openings.description: Main entrance door with reinforced security features and Vastu-compliant placement.
Large window to maximize natural light in the living room.
Window designed for additional ventilation and adherence to Vastu guidelines.

design_principles: Utilizes Vastu Shastra principles for room placement and energy flow
Optimized layout for natural light and ventilation in an urban farmhouse setting
additional_details.notes: This design is conceptual and intended as a bachelor pad arrangement with emphasis on minimalistic yet functional spaces. Detailed engineering drawings and adherence to local building codes are recommended before execution.
